archiefmat.titel_eng: Archive of the Franciscan Sisters "Alles voor Allen"
archiefmat.notes:
This archive will probably be transferred to the Erfgoedcentrum Nederlands Kloosterleven - St Agatha.

See the description of the record "Franciscanessen "Alles voor Allen" in the "Repertorium van Nederlandse zendings- en missie-archieven 1800-1960". 

Some documents, such as a register of patients, are kept in the St Elisabeth Hospital on Curacao; see C.J.H. Engels, "Het Sint Elisabeth Hospitaal te Curacao in West-Indie 1855-1972", Amsterdam 1981.
